'''Loot''' is what you [[Looting|scavenge]] from the depths of Tarkov. It is the cornerstone of survival. ==Image Guides==
  • File:QuestItemRequirements.png|Quest Items To Keep File:QuestItemsInRaid.png|Quest Items To Keep (Filtered to In Raid) File:Hideout-Requirements-Items-to-Keep.jpg|Hideout Items To Keep
    • ==List of loot== Use this table to prioritize what to take and what to leave behind. {|class="wikitable sortable" !Icon ! Name ! Type ! Notes |- ![[File:FolderWithIntelligence Icon.png|127px|link=Folder with intelligence]] ![[Folder with intelligence]] |Info item |'''[[Barter trades|Barter Item]]'''
    '''Hideout''' * 1 needs to be found for the [[Hideout#Modules|intelligence center level 1]] * 3 need to be found for the [[Hideout#Modules|intelligence center level 2]] |- ![[File:Matches Icon.png|64px|link=Classic matches]] ![[Classic matches]] |Flammable materials |'''[[Barter trades|Barter Item]]'''
    '''[[Crafts|Crafting item]]''' '''Hideout''' * 2 need to be found for the [[Hideout#Modules|heating level 1]] |- ![[File:Dogtags.png|127px|link=Dogtag]] ![[Dogtag]] |Others |'''[[Barter trades|Barter Item]]'''
